entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
